Detailed Description

Abstract super class for requests comming from outside mc2 that uses selectables.

uint32 SelectableInterfaceRequest::getTotalTimeout (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the current timeout for the whole process, in s.

This should be much longer than the ordinary timeout. Only checked after the ordinary timeout or read/write ready.

Definition at line 180 of file SelectableInterfaceRequest.h.

virtual void SelectableInterfaceRequest::handleIO (  bool  readyRead,
bool  readyWrite
)  [pure virtual]
 

Read and or write is ready make the IO.

May only call read/write once and only if readyRead/readyWrite is true.

Implemented in HttpInterfaceRequest, LoggingHttpInterfaceRequest, IsabBoxInterfaceRequest, and SendDataInterfaceRequest.

virtual bool SelectableInterfaceRequest::isIdle (   )  const [virtual]
 

If the request idle right now.

Waiting for client to reuse connection. Default false.

virtual void SelectableInterfaceRequest::terminate (   )  [virtual]
 

The irequest should try to get done as soon as possible.

This means that reuse of IO for another read of user request is not wanted. Default is to do nothing.

Reimplemented from InterfaceRequest.

Reimplemented in HttpInterfaceRequest, IsabBoxInterfaceRequest, and SendDataInterfaceRequest.
